Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
🎨 Major UI/UX Modernization - Complete Church System Redesign

## Theme & Colors
- Changed primary color from purple to royal blue (#1E40AF) for trust/faith
- Added gold secondary color (#B8860B) for divine/sacred elements  
- Implemented teal accent (#059669) for growth and life
- Created comprehensive theme system with proper spacing and shadows

## Layout Architecture
- Replaced restrictive AppShell layout with flexible SimpleLayout
- Implemented dual dashboard system (Servant Dashboard + Admin Dashboard)
- Added contextual navigation with smart sidebars
- Separated main navigation from dashboard navigation
- Admin panel now has distinct gold theme to differentiate from regular dashboard

## Page Improvements
- HomeScreen: Added cards, proper spacing, image carousel with thumbnails
- ServantInScreen: Modern service cards with hover effects, better grid layout
- AdminScreen: Grid layout for servants, improved visual hierarchy  
- StoreScreen: Better product cards with hover effects, points display
- AccountScreen: Organized with tabs (removed from dashboard nav)
- All pages wrapped in proper containers with consistent spacing

## Navigation Structure
- Main Header: Home, Store, Dashboard (servants), Admin Dashboard (admins)
- Dashboard Sidebar: Dashboard, Follow Up (no My Profile)
- Admin Sidebar: Admin Overview only
- Mobile: Responsive drawer with grouped sections
- Service selectors contextually appear based on current page

## Technical Changes
- Migrated from yarn to npm with --legacy-peer-deps
- Updated Mantine from v7 to v8 (attempted, reverted due to breaking changes)
- Fixed all import errors (FaDashboard→FaTachometerAlt, FaShield→FaShieldAlt)
- Removed all unnecessary added pages and layouts
- Cleaned up AppShell dependencies

## UX Improvements
- Better spacing with consistent padding/margins
- Hover effects on all interactive elements
- Loading states and empty states
- Visual feedback for active navigation items
- Responsive design for all screen sizes
- Cards with shadows for depth perception
- Color-coded areas (blue for dashboard, gold for admin)

## Files Removed
- All unnecessary pages in src/pages/admin, dashboard, public, legal
- AppShellLayout.jsx (replaced with SimpleLayout.jsx)
- Extra App.jsx versions (kept only main one)
- LoadingScreen component (using native Loader)

🚀 The app now has a modern, professional church management system design
   with improved user experience while maintaining all original functionality.

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
